name: Where Am I?
description:
It's been a full year and people are still playing.

Where Am I is a first-person horror game where your only goal is to find your way out of a paranormal apartment building.

You wake up confused and lost, you have one goal and that is to find a way out of the creepy apartment, while holding your phone as the only source of light. You will discover why you never want to wake up here looking for any clues or items to help you unlock your way out of a creepy rooms and strange dark hallways.

This game is now also available for free on the OUYA:

Where Am I? - Ouya

Brad Schuran - Twitter: @schuran
